    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String clean(java.lang.String bodyHtml)
      Get safe HTML from untrusted input HTML, by parsing input HTML and filtering it through a white-list of permitted tags and attributes.
      HtmlCleaner getHtmlCleaner()
      Get an HtmlCleaner instance to clean untrusted HTML based on a white-list of permitted tags and attributes.

      Get simple text with all HTML removed.

    • Method Detail

      • getHtmlCleaner

        public HtmlCleaner getHtmlCleaner()
        Get an HtmlCleaner instance to clean untrusted HTML based on a white-list of permitted tags and attributes. These are the text nodes: a, b, blockquote, br, caption, cite, code, col, colgroup, dd, div, dl, dt, em, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, i, img, li, ol, p, pre, q, small, span, strike, strong, sub, sup, table, tbody, td, tfoot, th, thead, tr, u, ul
        Returns:

      • clean

        public java.lang.String clean(java.lang.String bodyHtml)
        Get safe HTML from untrusted input HTML, by parsing input HTML and filtering it through a white-list of permitted tags and attributes.
        Parameters:
        bodyHtml -
        Returns:
        the clean HTML

      • getSimpleText

        public java.lang.String getSimpleText(java.lang.String bodyHtml)
        Get simple text with all HTML removed.
        Parameters:
        bodyHtml -
        Returns:
        the simple text representation of the bodyHtml
